pages.text: 21|25|aur nahin bheja hamane aapase pahale koee bhee rasool, parantu usakee or yahee vahî€¼yee (prakaashana) karate rahe ki mere siva koee poojy nahin hai. atah meree hee ibaadat (vandana) karo.
21|26|aur un (mushrikon) ne kaha ki bana liya hai atyant krpaasheel ne santati. vah pavitr hai. balki ve (farishte)[1] aadaraneey bhakt hain.
21|27|ve usake samaksh badhakar nahin bolate aur usake aadeshaanusaar kaam karate hain.
21|28|vah jaanata hai, jo unake saamane hai aur jo unase ojhal hai. vah kisee kee sifaarish nahin karenge, usake siva jisase vah (allaah) prasann[1] ho tatha vah usake bhay se sahame rahate hain.
21|29|aur jo kah de unamen se ki main poojy hoon allaah ke siva, to vahee hai, jise ham dand denge narak ka, isee prakaar, ham dand diya karate hain atyaachaariyon ko.

21|30|aur kya unhonne vichaar nahin kiya, jo kaafir ho gaye ki aakaash tatha dharatee donon mile hue[1] the, to hamane donon ko alag-alag kiya tatha hamane banaaya paanee se pratyek jeevit cheez ko? phir kya ve (is baat par) vishvaas nahin karate
21|31|aur hamane bana diye dharatee mein parvat, taaki jhuk na[1] jaaye unake saath aur bana diye un (parvaton) mein chaude raaste, taaki log raah paayen.
21|32|aur hamane bana diya aakaash ko surakshit chhat, phir bhee ve usake prateekon (nishaaniyon) se munh phere hue hain.
21|33|tatha vahee hai, jisane utpatti kee hai raatri tatha divas kee aur soory tatha chaand kee, pratyek ek mandal mein tair rahe[1] hain.
21|34|aur (he nabee!) hamane nahin banaayee hai, kisee manushy ke lie aapase pahale nityata. to yadi, aap mar[1] jaayen, to kya ve nity jeevee hain
21|35|pratyek jeev ko maran ka svaad chakhana hai aur ham tumhaaree pareeksha kar rahe hain, achchhee tatha buree paristhitiyon se tatha tumhen hamaaree hee or phir aana hai.
